jparsec.math

Class CGSConstant

  • java.lang.Object
    • jparsec.math.CGSConstant

  • public class CGSConstant
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to hold physical constants in C.G.S. units. Values are identical to the corresponding SI constants defined in Constant class, except for the corresponding unit change.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    T. Alonso Albi - OAN (Spain)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double AMU
      Atomic unit mass, or 1/12 of the mass of the C-12 isotope, in g.
      static double AU
      AU to cm transform coefficient.
      static double BOLTZMANN_CONSTANT
      Boltzmann constant in erg/K.
      static double H2_MASS
      Mass of the hydrogen molecule in g.
      static double PARSEC
      pc to cm transform coefficient.
      static double PLANCK_CONSTANT
      Planck constant in erg*s.
      static double SPEED_OF_LIGHT
      Light speed in cm/s.
      static double SUN_MASS
      Mass of the sun in g.
